name: Ubiquity Press Dataverse
description: Ubiquity Press is an open access publisher of peer-reviewed, academic journals. Our flexible publishing model makes journals affordable, and enables researchers around the world to find and access the information they need, without barriers. The following gives an overview of how we work. More information can be found in a recent interview with Chronicle of Higher Education: "Open Access Ahoy: An Interview with Ubiquity Press".
